title: RarmaRadio Pro 2.70.3 Multilingual (Install + Portable)
description:
RarmaRadio Pro 2.70.3 Multilingual (Install + Portable)

About this release

Release date: 11/06/2016
Language: multilingual
OS: Windows XP to 10 (x86-x64)
Install: run setup, do not launch the application, extract (copy) patch to installation directory and apply
Portable: patched, simply unpack and run executable

Minor Update 2.70.3
Fixed: Minor bug fixes

About RarmaRadio

With RarmaRadio you can receive and record thousands of radio stations available on the Internet. 
Powered by a world class radio directory it has everything you need for a wonderful listening experience.
Recording is available in many formats - including mp3, wma and ogg.

Key Features

- Listen to and record multiple stations simultaneously
- Create a schedule for automatic recording
- Shows cover art and lyrics for each song
- Saves tag information to music files
- Ability to add your own stations
- Add or update stations in the online database
- Store your favorites online
- Live365 support including track information
- Multiple language support


Homepage http://www.raimersoft.com/rarmaradio.aspx
